data.title: How to create new website on my hosting plan?
data.meta_description: To add a new website to your hosting plan, go to your Client Area > Websites > New Website Select the preferred domain name or register a new one and
data.text:
To add a new website to your hosting plan, go to your Client Area > Websites > New Website

Select the preferred domain name or register a new one and click on Continue. On the next step, choose if you would like to start a new website or to migrate an existing one and click on Select.

Check our dedicated tutorials with step-by-step instructions:
